IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_complete_quest') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_complete_quest GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_complete_quest @character_id dbo.id_t, @quest_code dbo.code_t AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM dbo.Complete_Quests WHERE character_id = @character_id AND quest_code = @quest_code
SET NOCOUNT OFF
